titleInfo.title: Nashville Railway and Light Company: Motorman and Conductor

mods.abstract: One color card fragment (blue on white) announcing, "The Motorman and the Conductor of this car are in constant attendance at the Nashville Railway and Light Company's School of Safety and Courtesy. There they have learned the higher art of Safeguarding Human Life and Property; and of giving Public Service with a smile."

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
